definitions: a person who breaks or fails to comply with a rule or formal agreement

examples.text: a major crackdown on violators of immigration regulations
the new smoking restrictions call for hefty fines for violators

shortDefinitions: person who breaks or fails to comply with rule or formal agreement

definitions: a person who treats something with irreverence or disrespect
shortDefinitions: person who treats something with disrespect

definitions: a person who rapes or sexually assaults someone

examples.text: Monica is able to name the violators of her body
a curse pronounced over the violators of children

shortDefinitions: person who rapes or sexually assaults someone
